Plot: After leaving jail, Víctor is still in love with Elena, but she's married to the former cop -now basketball player- who became paralysed by a shot from Víctor's gun...
Title: Live Flesh
Writer: Pedro Almodóvar, Jorge Guerricaechevarría, Ray Loriga, Ruth Rendell (novel)
Actors: Javier Bardem, Francesca Neri, Liberto Rabal, Ángela Molina
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 10 wins & 12 nominations.
